data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Dias, Fernando Maia Silva, Dolibaina, Diego Rodrigo, Mielke, Carlos Guilherme Costa, Mielke, Olaf Hermann Hendrik, Casagrande, Mirna Martins (2015): Description of two new species of Pheles Herrich – Schäffer, [1853] and notes on the taxonomic position of two species hitherto included in the genus (Riodinidae: Riodininae). Zootaxa 3981 (2): 275-283, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3981.2.8
